title: Tiejia Wei Chong Zhi Qi Ren Wang
synopsis: In the insect world, a group of kind beetles work hard every day to build their homes. But in the most remote village of Camellia in the Beetle Kingdom, there is an unknown secret hidden. One day, when Xingzi (Red Flame Seven Stars) was driving a mud truck to reclaim his wasteland, he was dragged up to the top of the mountain by Weilong (Wujiaweilong) to watch a Riding Blade King competition. In order to persuade the opponent to pay for his tea tree, Xing Tsai drove the mud truck and knocked over his opponent with only 3% of his energy, but it also made him unexpectedly discover that the mud truck he was driving was actually the legendary super blade king of the Red Flame family-Dragon Warrior. But after learning that there was such a person in Shancha Village, Griffon Villa's first master Gang Qianchi and the Captain of the White Tigers Team Armor God challenged Xingzi to try to compete. In order to meet the challenge, Grandpa Chi Yan, who originally wanted to conceal the facts, had to tell the truth-Xingzai’s father died on the field because he was driving a Dragon Knight competition, and he did not want the same tragedy and fate to happen again for Xingzai Remove the shell of the Dragon Warrior, disguise him as a mud truck, and don't allow Xingzi to use it to fight. He came to the big city with the dream of being a champion, and formed the Saint Beast team with Steel Thousand Wings, Armor God, and Miao Wenwen to meet new challenges. In the process of growing up, he learned that in order to win the championship manipulation competition by an evil scientist, the team used its magical power to dissolve the conspiracy of the evil scientist, won the championship of the finals, and became a legendary hero who saved the world of beetles.(translated from douban)

title: Menghuan Xiyou Zhi Tianming Zhi Zhan
synopsis: 500 years ago, Chi You wanted to introduce the outside world to destroy the Three Realms, and the world was not preserved. Fifteen heroes finally sealed Chi You at the Martial God Altar of the God of War at the cost of their lives. 500 years later, Chi You will break his seal soon. Demon turmoil, people with lofty ideals from the Three Realms join hands to save the common people, and the story begins... How can the fate of the past life continue in this life?(translated from douban)

Through the adventure process of the protagonist Blue Cat and his friends, it uses the problems it encounters to provide the audience with popular science knowledge. At the same time, the work unfolds a variety of novel and interesting stories through the adventures of the protagonist Blue Cat and his partners [1-2], each animation in the series is a relatively independent storyline. (translated from baidu baike)

synopsis: The play has taken its own path with the artistic creativity of "knowledge cartoon". title: Lan Mao Taoqi 3000 Wen Zhi Konglong Shidai
synopsis: The earth is attacked by unknown creatures. After investigation, it is an alien creature. It is a brutal compound dinosaur created by aliens using dinosaur gene recombination. Aliens want to occupy the earth. In order to defend the earth, the blue cat and others are ordered to go to the dinosaurs. The era is looking for dinosaur genes. After the dinosaur era, the rescued hadrosaurs brought the blue cat and came to the dinosaur family. The dinosaur family regarded them as heroes and forged a deep friendship. With the help of hadrosaurs, during a stormy night, the blue cat and his friends found the plant-eating dinosaurs-the parachutesaurus family. Tyrannosaurus rex is very lonely in the dinosaur family, because he is easy to kill and has a grumpy temper. The blue cat rescues the little dinosaurs killed by Tyrannosaurus again and again. Until a great mudslide disaster, the Tyrannosaurus rex was in danger, and the blue cat gave up his rescue. Tyrannosaurus was moved. It turned out that he was a stray child. He was rejected by the same kind since he was a child. When the blue cat and his friends gave him care, he was moved. Now... a new investigation mission is here. Under the leadership of the well-informed Tyrannosaurus, the Blue Cat investigation team entered a new area and encountered Tyrannosaurus...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 蓝猫淘气3000问之恐龙时代

title: Lan Mao Taoqi 3000 Wen Zhi Haiyang Shijie
synopsis: The earth is sick and the environment is deteriorating, causing the earth's resources to be in a hurry, and mankind is facing an unprecedented crisis. Faced with this situation, human beings pin their hopes on the resource-rich ocean. Blue cats, naughty, Feifei, and Curry formed a survey team to delve into the mysterious ocean world to find resources with human hope. However, when the investigation team overcame numerous difficulties in the mysterious sea and temporarily alleviated the earth's resource crisis, bigger problems emerged. The entire ocean world has shown more abnormal phenomena, and the disasters that have occurred in the ocean have gradually intensified. All kinds of abnormal phenomena make the questionable blue cat think deeply again... With the experience in the dinosaur era, the blue cat and its partners know how to get along with marine life and collect a lot of data. After the headquarters obtains the marine data, they immediately organize development and utilization. Everything seemed very smooth. At this time, Blue Cat analyzes some signs for everyone, warning everyone that if blindly develop blindly, it will lead to even greater disasters. However, everyone did not believe him. The blue cat could not find strong evidence. Everyone believed that the blue cat was deliberately making trouble, so they united to reject the blue cat. The contradiction intensified and the blue cat had to leave the collective... 　　 Just when everyone thought the ball crisis was alleviated, various marine disasters occurred. . Everyone is at a loss and can't find a solution. The situation gets worse, what should I do? The squeezed blue cat stood up again...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 蓝猫淘气3000问之海洋世界

title: Lan Mao Taoqi 3000 Wen Zhi Yundong Xilie
synopsis: The Olympic Games is about to begin. In order to qualify for the competition, the Blue Cats and their partners started secretly shouting. Just as the blue cats and their partners were training intensely, another participating team "Deep Mountain Old Forest Team" appeared. It was composed of cartoon characters such as green monkey, red dog, and croton.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 蓝猫淘气3000问之运动系列

title: Lan Mao Taoqi 3000 Wen Zhi Taikong Lixian Ji
synopsis: The story tells the legend that the deepest part of the universe "Otzma" is a perfect planet. Inspired by the deeds of China’s first astronaut Yang Liwei, Blue Cat, who is working as a handyman on the expedition, is determined To become the greatest space explorer in the world, he recruited good friends such as the naughty pilot, the chef Croton, and the magician Feifei, and set out to prepare his own expedition. One day, a spaceship landed on the earth strangely. Inside the spaceship were a comatose alien girl and a docile little pet. The nervous little pet flew out of the spaceship without awakening the owner. The hungry little pet accidentally ran into the blue cat. The curious little guy was mischievous, and caused the blue cat and the others to be burned. The blue cat and the others chased the little pet and found an alien spacecraft that had landed on the earth. Relying on the magical power of the light wave stone in his hand, the blue cat helped everyone enter the spaceship and awakened the unconscious alien girl. The spacecraft took off, and the Blue Cat and others became real astronauts, and the long journey to Otzma began.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 蓝猫淘气3000问之太空历险记

title: Lan Mao Zhi Pingan Chuxing
synopsis: Lan Mao and An An and other small partners who maintain traffic safety lead the people living in Sun City to work together to maintain the city's traffic safety. The cartoon image of Beijing traffic police was launched. Teach children to raise awareness of traffic safety in daily life, attach importance to traffic safety, and consciously maintain traffic order.(translated from douban)

title: Lan Mao Jiankang Tegong Dui
synopsis: The story is centered on the Health Assault Team with Blue Cat as the captain. In an accident, Princess Otzma chased the virus Coulee to the earth. The spacecraft crashed accidentally, causing a large area of alien virus infection, and Coulee virus was also found. A host: Tuantuan. In order to save Tuantuan’s life and prevent the virus from mutating, the Health Assault Team went deep into the gang and fought a desperate battle with Coulee virus. But when Coulee virus was defeated, Dr. Yuan discovered that Coulee virus crystals are If it can be copied, it must be found and destroyed within 28 days. However, in Tuantuan’s body, what awaits them, except for the playful and enthusiastic King Mante who is dedicated to protecting his people, the loyal Eastern minister, the strong gastrooper, the righteous lung queen... and Is it more unknowns and crises?(translated from douban)

title: Lan Mao Zhi Xiaofang Dabenying
synopsis: "Lan Mao Zhi Xiaofang Dabenying" has a total length of 119 episodes and is composed of more than 30 stories, emphasizing storytelling and interest. The stories are relatively independent, and they are connected as a whole through eight penetrating characters. The story tells the story of a "119 team" composed of a group of children under the guidance of the fire brigade in a city with mountains and rivers. In order to ensure the safety of people’s lives and property, they actively promote and popularize fire protection knowledge to all walks of life with a high sense of responsibility; and apply fire protection knowledge to take various measures to eliminate hidden fire hazards; in the face of disasters, they are selfless and fearless, brave and strong, and save themselves Rescuing people; witty identification of criminals who have different purposes to create fires; using scientific methods and rigorous reasoning to detect various suspects.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Lan Mao Dian Dian Huan Youji
synopsis: The magical space-time mirror entrusts Blue Cat and Diandian with many novel and interesting tasks. In order to complete these tasks, Blue Cat and Diandian travel the world, and various People to deal with. In the process of traveling around the world, the carefree blue cat gradually learned to respect others. In the process of helping everyone, the unreliable Dian Dian understood the importance of learning knowledge. Along the way, Blue Cat and Diandian had quarrels and cooperation, and forged a deep friendship. They worked together and passed the final test.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Lan Mao Taoqi 3000 Wen Zhi Wo Wei Yundong Kuang
synopsis: With the approach of the 2008 Olympic Games, the nation welcomes the Olympics, and the land of China is full of sports crazes. The Cartoon City is naturally not to be left behind. In order to welcome the arrival of the Olympics, popularize Olympic knowledge and promote the Olympic spirit, it is a unique card game. It came into being. The blue cats and others living in Cartoon City formed the gold medal blue cat team, and the green monkeys living in the sports village formed the deep mountain old forest team and joined this competitive event. So, as the game progressed , In the story, the blue cat and his partners, as well as the green monkey and other players from the fierce competition at the beginning, gradually entered the competitive state of you dissatisfied with me and I dissatisfied with you, and later developed into a competitive state of friendship. There is competition in friendship. We work together and move forward together. Unknowingly, we deepen our understanding and perception of the Olympic spirit step by step. Finally, the story ends in the hopeful laughter of Blue Cat and others...(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 蓝猫淘气3000问之我为运动狂

title: Lan Mao Yundong Xiaozi
synopsis: The film takes the Olympic torchbearer as a clue, tells the story of the blue cats and their partners happily exercising, happy sports, and happy competition in the sports-loving town. It is of positive significance for promoting the Olympic spirit, popularizing Olympic knowledge, and promoting competition etiquette. . (translated from douban)

title: Lan Mao Taiyang Cheng De Gushi
synopsis: The film is a light comedy of life. Blue Cat came to Sun City to experience life because of the need for filming. The news spread quickly and made a sensation throughout the city. As a result, all the stories revolved around the learning, life and other things between Blue Cat and his partners. In addition to reflecting the children’s study and life, this film also focuses on current social issues from the perspective of children, such as being honest, being kind to others, anti-violence, loving, pursuing dreams, chasing stars, friendship, family issues, education Institutions, mutual help, re-employment of families... and other social issues, there are many different aspects, show the children's innocence, and advocate the themes of truth, goodness and beauty.(translated from douban)

title: Lan Mao Xing Shi Chuanshuo
synopsis: It tells the various journeys of the blue cats and their partners searching for the planet "Otzma", the deepest part of the legendary universe, and helps the indifferent people on the planet to restore the kind hearts and emotions in their hearts. It embodies the firm will and belief of Blue Cat in pursuing ideals and advocates the truth, goodness and beauty of human nature.(translated from douban)

title: Lan Mao Xiwang Jiayuan
synopsis: Because there is a magical magic stone, the place where the little alien girl lives on earth, even in the cold winter, is still full of flowers and spring—this is her hope home. Because living here, at the moment of "Cross Link", relatives in outer space can find her and come to visit her. 　　 The moment when another "cross star" is coming, Lara is full of expectations, because my mother promised to visit her. However, at this moment, an unexpected flash flood broke out. In order to save the village below the mountain, Lala resolutely diverted the flood, but her hope home was destroyed by the flood and the magic stone was also lost. La la is very sad. Her friends-Blue Cat, Naughty, Feifei, Croton, Curry, etc. came quickly after learning the news. Everyone created miracles with persistence, love, courage and confidence. Without magic stones, they used their own With both hands, I rebuilt the hopeful homeland of blooming flowers and full of spring in the severe cold winter, and helped Lala to meet her mother when the "Cashier" arrived. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Lan Mao Long Qi Tuan
synopsis: In the high-tech future world, humans, with the help of scientists from the planet of Otzma, have created a dragon riding bracelet that represents the highest level of human technology. The bracelet can summon mechanical dinosaurs with different personalities and great abilities. However, an evil force that wanted to dominate the earth secretly orchestrated a conspiracy to steal the bracelet. After the dark forces failed to snatch the bracelet, they summoned a powerful and destructive clone alien-the king of beasts to attack humans. In order to fight against the king of beasts developed by the dark forces, the Dragoons decided to return to the age of dinosaurs hundreds of millions of years ago, find the five best dinosaur eggs, extract genes, perfect the dragon knight bracelet, and resist the king of beasts.(translated from douban)

synopsis: This film tells the story of the protagonist Blue Cat and Diandian traveling through different countries and regions through the mirror of time and space to learn about etiquette knowledge and customs around the world.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Le Bi Youyou
synopsis: In the kindergarten class of the future world, Lebi and the alien children attend classes and play games together. Although everyone looks different, they have their own characteristics. Xiao Lebi's hands-on ability is the first in the class. Xiao Lebi’s father is a spacecraft designer, and Lebi often brings wonderful ideas to his father. Xiao Lebi’s mother is a caring and wise veterinarian. She can not only treat small animals on the earth, but also heal the diseases of small alien animals. The alien bunny yoyo is one of the small animals cured by his mother, and it has become a close friend of Xiao Lebi.(translated from douban)

title: Le Bi Youyou Jiaoyu Xilie Zhi Kuaile Chengzhang
synopsis: The little girl Lebi lives in a happy family of four with her younger brother Yoyo. Father is an inventor, mother is a housewife, and parents teach Lebi and Yoyo. Lebi and Youyou also have a group of friends who study and play together. While overcoming difficulties, they also learned a lot of knowledge.(translated from douban)

title: Tianshang Diao Xia Ge Zhubajie
synopsis: Marshal Tianpeng coveted Fairy Chang'e's beauty and courageously pursued it, so he was punished by the Jade Emperor. During the escort, Marshal Tianpeng broke free from the shackles and tried to escape, but he accidentally hit and reincarnated and became a pig. The land inadvertently overturned the magic weapon "Ganoderma Lucidum Dew" of Guanyin Bodhisattva, and the Ganoderma Lucidum was sprinkled on the head of the Marshal Canopy. From then on, there was a pig-headed Pig Bajie. 　　 Zhu Bajie came to Heaven to avenge himself, but because of his gluttonous habits, he had a dispute with his former partner, Foday, and Foday was demoted to the world. The land invited Zhu Bajie to be the security guard in his temple, and Zhu Bajie drove away the wild boars who used to cause trouble, but could not deal with the cunning mice. Foday and Zhu Bajie seem to be happy with each other, and they fight each other to tear down the stage, triggering a scene of hilarious laughter. (translated from douban)

title: Jingling Shiji
synopsis: For a long time, the elven kingdom has been guarding the gem of the source of life that is related to the survival of mankind. However, the evil dark elves coveted the powerful power of gems. They summoned terrible demons and occupied the kingdom of elves. Just as the gems were about to fall into the hands of thieves, the brave and tenacious Elf Prince Kaka (voiced by Chu Jun) brought Gems came to the world with the help of Princess Noya of the Elf Kingdom (voiced by Chu Jun), and met the stationery king Charlie (voiced by Jackie Chan) and toy leader Kaida (voiced by Li Yong) through misplay. 　　 There are often fierce conflicts between the stationery led by Charlie and the toy army led by Yukaida, but their wish is the same, that is, they hope their little master can grow up healthy and happy. The arrival of Kaka allowed Charlie and Al Qaeda to shoulder the arduous task of saving the planet and defending peace.(translated from douuban)

title: Zhu Zhu Xia Zhi Zhongji Juezhan Qianye Pian
synopsis: The fairy tale world ushered in a new era of peaceful coexistence between monsters and humans. But after entering the dark gate, Barrow, the initiator of the last round of crisis, was activated by the mysterious bloodline hidden in his body. The memory of the ancient genes drove Barrow to lead the ancient monsters to avenge the humans. Barrow completely solved the seal of the three monsters that escaped from the cracks in the dark gate in the last round of fierce battle. Their abilities were awakened. Began to wreak havoc on the city. Piggy-Man was shocked and learned that his father Barrow turned out to be the leader of the monster, so he decided to find his father and let him correct his evil. In front of his father who had gone astray, Pigman didn't choose to help him be abusive, but decided to call his father's heart with family affection, and finally eliminated the imminent crisis again.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 猪猪侠之终极决战前夜篇

title: Zhu Zhu Xia Zhi Shenhai Xiao Yingxiong
synopsis: On the beautiful Pig Star, when Pig Man and Feifei, Bobby, Xiao Dida, Superman, and Dazed came to the beach to enjoy a good time, a sudden accident happened. Everyone was brought to a brand new by a big beast. The blue moon star of the submarine civilization, and was told that the blue moon star is facing extinction, and it will also affect the pig star. In order to save their homes, Pigman and others must go to twelve different sea areas to collect twelve sea core fragments according to the predictions of the ancient heroes and restore the peace of Blue Moon Star. The resurrection of King Nemesis back then created all sorts of dangerous troubles for the Pig Man team, but the protagonist team did not shrink from this, but faced difficulties and continued to grow amidst difficulties. The gradual deepening of the team's tacit understanding and the belief in defending their homeland convinced them that they were a hero who could save the world. The adventure squad fought side by side with a group of righteous men such as Coral Princess, and defeated Nemesis's series of conspiracy and tricks. The next task will be more difficult, but they still go forward courageously and never give up. The great demon King Nie Meses who had regained his freedom began to uncontrollably absorb Blue Moon Star's water resources. In order to retain the last hope, Pigman and the others brought Sea Heart Fragments to a strategic retreat to another world where time and space are turbulent-Zero World. Here, they met all the righteous people who insisted on their beliefs and fought for the salvation of the world, such as Su Xi, Wei Xiaoshan, Kung Fu Xia, etc., withstood the test of the sea of time in Zero Realm, and finally returned to Blue Moon Star and inherited The true ability of ancient heroes, defend the last chance to save Blue Moon Star.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Zhu Zhu Xia Zhi Yong Chuang Juren Dao
synopsis: The Pig Man who runs the "Pig and All Things House" in the fairy tale world won a magic bean in the lottery, and finally went to Giant Island with his friends Pigman's Courage to Giant Island Stills Pigman's Courage to Giant Island Stills (7 photos) s story. Pigman gets a magic bean. Later, Jack, the owner of Magic Beans, found Pigman and said that Magic Bean had a fat relationship with the giant goose that would lay golden eggs, and he entrusted Pigman to help find the giant goose on Giant Island. In order to polish up the sign of the "House of Pigs", Pigman and his companions gladly accepted Jack's commission and began their thrilling Giant Island adventure. However, Pigman and his companions did not know that at this time they were falling into a whirlpool of huge conspiracy. The bizarre Giant Island is full of unknown dangers. After going through hardships and hardships, the Pigman and his team sneaked into the giant's castle and took away the giant goose that would lay golden eggs, but they were chased by the giant. The geese they rode fell into the forest from the sky and fell into danger again. After many setbacks, Pigman and his companions finally found a way to escape from Giant Island. But at this time Jack tore off the veil of disguise. It turned out that he was the most sinister thief in the fairy tale world. All that happened was a scam he set up to steal the goose that would lay golden eggs on Giant Island. Suddenly, the Pigman put on his battle clothes again and fought to help the giant regain the giant goose.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Zhu Zhu Xia Zhi Yingxiong Zhu Shaonian
synopsis: The legendary five spirit lock has the magical power to protect the world, but by mistake, the pig man (voiced by Zhang Zikun) who is "worthless" was selected as its owner. At this time, a terrifying man in black appeared, his goal It was actually going to destroy all the Five Spirit Locks. The fledgling Piggy-Man faced the difficulties and went through a lot of competitions. Piggy-Man discovered that the man in black turned out to be himself 13 years later...(translated from douban)

title: Zhu Zhu Xiabukesiyi De Shijie
synopsis: The fifth "Pig Man" movie tells the story of Auspice, a girl who has loved Pig Man since she was a child. Due to the pressure of her studies and her parents, she was sad and sad. A picture of the dream world of Pig Man in the auspicious room , Makes her accidentally traverse the fantasy world, where Jixiang meets the childhood hero Pigman, whose superpower has disappeared. In order to send Jixiang home, Pigman and Jixiang embark on a laughable but thrilling adventure.(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 猪猪侠·不可思议的世界

title: Hong Mao Lan Tu Nao Xinchun
synopsis: "Rainbow Cat and Blue Rabbit Makes New Year" has a total of 110 minutes and a total investment of more than 25 million yuan. No one showed up throughout the party. The "hosts" were Wang Hong's two "new children" ---Hong Mao and Blue Rabbit. Both of these animal hosts are created with three-dimensional technology, and even the shadow will move with the movement of the characters. They have vivid expressions, flexible movements, and vivid character expressions. The company invested more than 3 million yuan to purchase a motion capture system. The rainbow cats and blue rabbits produced in this way are very similar to real people, whether they blink, move their mouths, or run and jump. 　　 In addition to the two "hosts", there will be an auditorium that can accommodate 38,000 cartoon characters. When the show is wonderful, applause and cheers in the audience will be heard. 　　 Evening shows are no different from general variety shows. The format covers sketches, operas, singing and dancing, TV series and so on. In the opera joint singing, there are excerpts from Peking opera "Lin Haixueyuan", excerpts from Henan opera "Mulan", Huagu opera "Liu Hai Chopping Woods" and so on. The cartoon animals are very cute in traditional Chinese opera costumes. What was super funny in the party was the bear squirrel version of the "Super Life Guerrilla". Huang Hong and Song Dandan were replaced by a dumb bear and a pretty squirrel respectively. The performance of two animals "for superbirth" made people laugh. (translated from douban)

title: Hong Mao Lan Tu Ao You Guo Lixian Ji
synopsis: "The Adventures of Rainbow Cat and Blue Rabbit Oyo Country" is a fantasy-themed animation series combining two-dimensional and three-dimensional technology. There are 52 episodes and each episode is 17 minutes. "The Adventures of Rainbow Cat and Blue Rabbit Oyo Country" tells the story of Rainbow Cat and Blue Rabbit who participated in the anniversary celebration of the reunification of the dream country and received a distress letter from neighboring Oyo Country. The two and Michael were ordered to explore Oyo Country together, but found that everyone here had lost their dreams and was gradually becoming porcelain. In order to save the people of Oyo Country, Rainbow Cat, Blue Rabbit, and Tang Seng came to Oyo Country and began a dream-making action, but found that the dream core of people here has been lost, and dreams cannot be created at all. The instigator of all this came from an old woman named Monica. When she discovered that the dream core can restore her youthful beauty, she began to use material enjoyment to lure the people of Oyo country to sell the dream core. 　　 In order to help the people of Oyo country find their old dreams, Hong Maolantu and Tang Seng can only create beautiful dreams if they find the super dream core-the son of dreams. With the help of Pudding, a young boy from Oyo Country, Hong Mao and his party embarked on a journey to find the son of a dream, but Monica, will Hong Mao and the others destroy her plan of youthfulness?(translated from douban)

details.Japanese: 虹猫蓝兔奥悠国历险记

title: Hong Mao Lan Tu Le Fantian
synopsis: In Rainbow Cat and Blue Rabbit Le Fantian, various cartoon stars gather together, and the eight immortals cross the sea, showing their magical powers. Humorous sketches one after another, funny and amused, make you laugh endlessly. Rich and interesting encyclopedic knowledge, entertaining and learning. There are various forms of puzzle games, and you can use your brain. (translated from douban)

title: Hong Mao Lan Tu Maoyan Kan Yuzhou
synopsis: A anime to learn about universe.

details.Japanese: 虹貓藍兔童話王國曆險記

title: Qi Qi Ke Ke Lixian Ji
synopsis: "The Adventures of Qiqi Keke" tells the story of a small Tyrannosaurus rex fighting against fate. When the little Tyrannosaurus was still an egg, he was taken by the claws of the egg-stealing dragon to the camp of the Crimson Dragon by accident, and he and his sister little Crimson Dragon depended on each other. When he grew up, Qiqi was unanimously squeezed out by the mother-in-law dragons. In sadness, he and Zhuge embarked on a journey to find his mother. Since then, a series of wonderful and mysterious adventures have been launched in the Cretaceous land...(translated from douban)

title: Qi Qi Ke Ke Zhi Conglin Qiyu
synopsis: The second season of 'Qi Qi Ke Ke' series.

title: Xi Mu Ba Long Jiazu
synopsis: The film tells a story about defending the homeland. The whole film is full of contradictions between good and evil, beauty and ugliness, humanity and animality. Through the three little dragons, they hone themselves through setbacks and failures, and grow up in the choices and trials of life and death, love and hate. , Be stronger, and constantly surpass his own story, conveying the spiritual power of bravery, strength and love. The film shows a positive and optimistic attitude towards life. Deduced an inspirational legend of a young hero! (translated from douban)

title: Qi Qi Ke Ke Shuo Konglong
synopsis: Qiqi Keke will lead the audience into the magical dinosaur era, reproduce the infinitely charming dinosaur life scene, let the children really feel the "happy, angry, sad and happy" of the dinosaurs, and get in touch with the mysterious dinosaur world. (translated from douban)

title: Shen Chu Xiaofu Gui
synopsis: The story takes place in the last years of the Qing Dynasty. Xiao Fugui's grandfather was Cixi's royal chef, and he was deeply used by him. Xiao Fugui learned the cooking skills with his grandfather since he was a child, and respected him very much. However, Grandpa was accidentally involved in a conspiracy and was mistakenly regarded as the culprit of the poisoning and was thrown into prison after Qiuqiu asked. 　　 In order to return his grandfather's innocence and find out the truth of the incident, Xiao Fugui resolutely embarked on a journey. He wanted to obtain 18 golden kitchen utensils with his own power and carry forward the style of Hong Jiacai. The high-spirited little Fukuki naturally attracted the attention of K behind the scenes and became the opponent he wanted to get rid of. On the way of adventure, Xiao Fugui met the chivalrous woman Xiao Feidi who wanted to assassinate Empress Dowager Cixi to avenge her parents, and the two helped each other to support each other. In the end, can Xiao Fugui achieve his wish?(translated from douban)

title: Tu Baobao He San Jian Shenqi Baobei
synopsis: Far and far away, there is a giant wood forest in which three cute baby bunnies live: Hanhan, Fatty and Miaomiao. Before their mothers went far away, they left three magical treasures-wisdom schoolbag, perseverance running shoes and courage treasure box. Shuai Lang Shuai Dida and Chao Lang Hua Xiuxiu in the forest coveted these three treasures. In order to capture the three treasures, Quick Wolf and Super Wolf set up one trap after another, and in order to keep the treasures, the three baby rabbits and the two wolves launched a series of wonderful and funny wits. Although the quick wolves and the super wolves have endless conspiracies and tricks, they still ask for hardship and end in failure.(translated from baidu baike)

details.Japanese: 兔宝宝和三件神奇宝贝

title: Zhongguo Nanhai Hongzhanhui
synopsis: The anime is about Hongzhanhui's life.

title: Huazhi De Gushi
synopsis: This film tells the growth story of the young guide Wen Huazhi. Wen Huazhi in childhood was a diligent, sensible, hard-working child. She was a careful sister at home, and a serious student at school; after working, she was an aggressive employee. This accumulation of time has created Wen Huazhi's strong sense of responsibility. When the car accident happened, in the face of the panic of the people, the severely injured Huazhi showed a rare calmness. She encouraged the tourists and shouted the touching words "Save the tourists first" during the rescue. Although she lost her left leg, Huazhi lives optimistically. She still looks forward to her bright future. The theme of the film is healthy and progressive, and it has a positive effect on guiding young people to establish a correct outlook on life and values.(translated from douban)

title: Idol Land PriPara
synopsis: Tie-in anime linked to the "Idol Land PriPara" smartphone game.

details.Japanese: アイドルランドプリパラ

title: Fuwa: Chao Shikong Renwu
synopsis: One of Fuwa, Beibei, encountered fierce fighting "Athena, Goddess of Peace" and "Aris, God of War" in a dream. The defeated Athena was seriously injured. She told Beibe: In 1896 in the space-time tunnel, there was a wooden box with huge energy hidden. Only by getting the energy inside can she restore her shield and life, and defeat the evil Ares. . 　　 After waking up, at the prompt of Coubertin's letter, Beibei made an oath: to travel through time and space, return to 1896, and help the goddess to obtain the wooden box. 　　According to Athena's instructions: Beibei went down to the sea to look for the old man of Eastern time and space, "Must He". But in the deep sea canyon, I encountered a gluttonous little monster-Pihu. He is the nine sons of the dragon, the younger brother of Bixi. Many years ago, I fell into the sea because I wanted to eat the sun. I am currently suffering from my "eternal hunger" stomach problem. When I heard about the wooden box that hides huge energy, I also actively joined Beibei's travel. 　　 Under the leadership of Pixiu, Beibei found Bixi. Bixie drove the two into the "time-space tunnel", but shortly after passing through the gate of the 21st century, he was caught in an ambush by Ares's Purulu. Bixie was blind in both eyes and was forced to stop traveling. 　　 must like to ask the children to enter the nearest time and space-in 1984, look for a drop of tears from the most excited and happiest moment of mankind to clean their eyes, so that they can continue to travel and return to 1896. 　　Pixiu and Beibei respectively found Chinese shooter Xu Haifeng and Haitian marathon athlete Lamot in 1984. After many setbacks, Beibei drew tears from Lamot. When the two returned to the time-space tunnel, they met Ares who had fought against Bixi. In the chaos, Bixi's Dragon Ruyi was taken away, and his body became weak and shrinking. 　　 Beibei used tears to restore Bixie's eyesight, but only by retrieving Ruyi can he cross the gate of the next century and enter 1896. So Bixie took the two children and started looking for Ruyi. 　　 They have discovered the existence of Ruyi in different Olympic years, but they have collected small Ruyi beads. It turned out that Ruyi was scattered by Ares and placed on the athlete to replicate the energy for his own use. With the efforts of Pixiu and Beibei, the wishful pearls were collected one by one, and finally two left to form the wishful dragon. 　　 At this time, Ares created a trap and took the three to his dark kingdom-Skull Island. 　　 With the help of the Fuwa brothers and sisters, Beibei woke up at a critical moment, rescued Pixiu, and escaped from Skull Island. 　　 The two went into 1988 with the help of other Fuwa, and found the last two wishful beads, and took the opportunity to discover the secret of Skull Island-only the Olympic flame can break through the gate to Skull Island. 　　 But the dark little demon sealed the road to the Olympic node and prevented them from obtaining the torch. 　　 Pixiu recalled that a person he had met at the Tokyo Olympics said that he was going to steal the torch and show it to his fathers and villagers. So he took Bei Bei to the man's hometown: Kagoshima, where he got the torch that had been burning for more than 20 years. 　　 The two used the sacred fire to break into Skull Island, rescued Bixi, and retrieved all the wishful beads. 　　 Ruyizhu merged to form Ruyi, and Bixi was completely restored. They happily went to the gate of the 19th century, only to find that even if Ruyi, the gate could not be opened. It turned out that Ares would be happy to escape, and Ruyi was also taken back, so they forcibly blocked the Century Gate, and according to Pihu Talking about the information revealed in 1896 in Athens, Greece, looking for wooden boxes. 　　 Under the reminder of the good friend Huoer of Bixi, they learned that the only way to open the door is to collect information on human memory. As long as you find enough five kinds of information: generosity, justice, humility, talent, and integrity (corresponding to benevolence, righteousness, courtesy, wisdom, and faith), you can lift the seal and open the door to the century. 　　 So the three again entered the Olympic Games in time and space to search. 　　 At the 1924 Paris Olympics, he obtained Harrod's "little message". 　　 Obtained Liu Changchun's "Message of Righteousness" at the 1932 Los Angeles Olympics. 　　 At the 1936 Berlin Olympics, he obtained Owens’s "Benevolence Message", Luz Lang’s "Righteous Message", and fencer Helena’s "Faith Message". 　　 At the 1948 London Olympics, he obtained Finney's "information of wisdom". 　　 I got information from Meng Guanliang, Yang Wenjun and Waldner at the 2004 Athens Olympics. In the meantime, Ares saw the situation fail step by step, and in desperation, he had to ask for help from the Gorgeous Medusa, who lives in the Sea of ​​Death, and asked her to take out the "Horn of Darkness" so that he could have the power to summon the dark monster army. . Therefore, when the three of them brought enough memory information to open the gate of the century, they were attacked by the dark monster army. The two entangled and fought into 1896. Finally, Beibei used wisdom to repel the monster and used Athena to give The olive leaf found the location of the buried wooden box. 　　 Unexpectedly, just after dug out the wooden box, Ares snatched the wooden box again. Beibei, Pixiu, and Bixie tried their best to chase into Skull Island, and Bixie held the gate with his body at the gate of Skull Island and turned it into a stone sculpture. 　　 The final battle started on Skull Island. Four other Fuwas sent by Coubertin also joined the battle. Skull Island was dark. In order to defeat Fuwa, Ares opened the wooden box. Unexpectedly, the wooden box was empty, and there was no "great energy" as he imagined. The only thing that fell out was one sentence-"Call on young people from all over the world to fight on the field. Instead of fighting on the battlefield." 　　 At this time, Athena was resurrected, and the cracks on the shield recovered one by one. She turned Ares into a mass of mud and melted on the ground of Skull Island. The originally gloomy Skull Island suddenly grew luxuriant flowers and plants, and the Bixi stone sculpture stood peacefully here. 　　 Athena asked them to be wary of Ares's resurrection, and told them that Bixie was not dead. As long as the Olympics continue, he will be resurrected. The sad Pixue decided to stay with the sixth brother until he woke up. 　　 The Fuwas returned to 2008 and worked hard to protect the Olympic Games.(translated from douban)

Unexpectedly, the wooden box was empty, and there was no "great energy" as he imagined. The only thing that fell out was one sentence-"Call on young people from all over the world to fight on the field. Instead of fighting on the battlefield." 　　 At this time, Athena was resurrected, and the cracks on the shield recovered one by one. She turned Ares into a mass of mud and melted on the ground of Skull Island. The originally gloomy Skull Island suddenly grew luxuriant flowers and plants, and the Bixi stone sculpture stood peacefully here. 　　 Athena asked them to be wary of Ares's resurrection, and told them that Bixie was not dead. As long as the Olympics continue, he will be resurrected. The sad Pixue decided to stay with the sixth brother until he woke up. 　　 The Fuwas returned to 2008 and worked hard to protect the Olympic Games.(translated from douban)

title: Fuwa: Chao Shikong Renwu
synopsis: One of Fuwa, Beibei, encountered fierce fighting "Athena, Goddess of Peace" and "Aris, God of War" in a dream. The defeated Athena was seriously injured. She told Beibe: In 1896 in the space-time tunnel, there was a wooden box with huge energy hidden. Only by getting the energy inside can she restore her shield and life, and defeat the evil Ares. . 　　 After waking up, at the prompt of Coubertin's letter, Beibei made an oath: to travel through time and space, return to 1896, and help the goddess to obtain the wooden box. 　　According to Athena's instructions: Beibei went down to the sea to look for the old man of Eastern time and space, "Must He". But in the deep sea canyon, I encountered a gluttonous little monster-Pihu. He is the nine sons of the dragon, the younger brother of Bixi. Many years ago, I fell into the sea because I wanted to eat the sun. I am currently suffering from my "eternal hunger" stomach problem. When I heard about the wooden box that hides huge energy, I also actively joined Beibei's travel. 　　 Under the leadership of Pixiu, Beibei found Bixi. Bixie drove the two into the "time-space tunnel", but shortly after passing through the gate of the 21st century, he was caught in an ambush by Ares's Purulu. Bixie was blind in both eyes and was forced to stop traveling. 　　 must like to ask the children to enter the nearest time and space-in 1984, look for a drop of tears from the most excited and happiest moment of mankind to clean their eyes, so that they can continue to travel and return to 1896. 　　Pixiu and Beibei respectively found Chinese shooter Xu Haifeng and Haitian marathon athlete Lamot in 1984. After many setbacks, Beibei drew tears from Lamot. When the two returned to the time-space tunnel, they met Ares who had fought against Bixi. In the chaos, Bixi's Dragon Ruyi was taken away, and his body became weak and shrinking. 　　 Beibei used tears to restore Bixie's eyesight, but only by retrieving Ruyi can he cross the gate of the next century and enter 1896. So Bixie took the two children and started looking for Ruyi. 　　 They have discovered the existence of Ruyi in different Olympic years, but they have collected small Ruyi beads. It turned out that Ruyi was scattered by Ares and placed on the athlete to replicate the energy for his own use. With the efforts of Pixiu and Beibei, the wishful pearls were collected one by one, and finally two left to form the wishful dragon. 　　 At this time, Ares created a trap and took the three to his dark kingdom-Skull Island. 　　 With the help of the Fuwa brothers and sisters, Beibei woke up at a critical moment, rescued Pixiu, and escaped from Skull Island. 　　 The two went into 1988 with the help of other Fuwa, and found the last two wishful beads, and took the opportunity to discover the secret of Skull Island-only the Olympic flame can break through the gate to Skull Island. 　　 But the dark little demon sealed the road to the Olympic node and prevented them from obtaining the torch. 　　 Pixiu recalled that a person he had met at the Tokyo Olympics said that he was going to steal the torch and show it to his fathers and villagers. So he took Bei Bei to the man's hometown: Kagoshima, where he got the torch that had been burning for more than 20 years. 　　 The two used the sacred fire to break into Skull Island, rescued Bixi, and retrieved all the wishful beads. 　　 Ruyizhu merged to form Ruyi, and Bixi was completely restored. They happily went to the gate of the 19th century, only to find that even if Ruyi, the gate could not be opened. It turned out that Ares would be happy to escape, and Ruyi was also taken back, so they forcibly blocked the Century Gate, and according to Pihu Talking about the information revealed in 1896 in Athens, Greece, looking for wooden boxes. 　　 Under the reminder of the good friend Huoer of Bixi, they learned that the only way to open the door is to collect information on human memory. As long as you find enough five kinds of information: generosity, justice, humility, talent, and integrity (corresponding to benevolence, righteousness, courtesy, wisdom, and faith), you can lift the seal and open the door to the century. 　　 So the three again entered the Olympic Games in time and space to search. 　　 At the 1924 Paris Olympics, he obtained Harrod's "little message". 　　 Obtained Liu Changchun's "Message of Righteousness" at the 1932 Los Angeles Olympics. 　　 At the 1936 Berlin Olympics, he obtained Owens’s "Benevolence Message", Luz Lang’s "Righteous Message", and fencer Helena’s "Faith Message". 　　 At the 1948 London Olympics, he obtained Finney's "information of wisdom". 　　 I got information from Meng Guanliang, Yang Wenjun and Waldner at the 2004 Athens Olympics. In the meantime, Ares saw the situation fail step by step, and in desperation, he had to ask for help from the Gorgeous Medusa, who lives in the Sea of ​​Death, and asked her to take out the "Horn of Darkness" so that he could have the power to summon the dark monster army. . Therefore, when the three of them brought enough memory information to open the gate of the century, they were attacked by the dark monster army. The two entangled and fought into 1896. Finally, Beibei used wisdom to repel the monster and used Athena to give The olive leaf found the location of the buried wooden box. 　　 Unexpectedly, just after dug out the wooden box, Ares snatched the wooden box again. Beibei, Pixiu, and Bixie tried their best to chase into Skull Island, and Bixie held the gate with his body at the gate of Skull Island and turned it into a stone sculpture. 　　 The final battle started on Skull Island. Four other Fuwas sent by Coubertin also joined the battle. Skull Island was dark. In order to defeat Fuwa, Ares opened the wooden box. Unexpectedly, the wooden box was empty, and there was no "great energy" as he imagined. The only thing that fell out was one sentence-"Call on young people from all over the world to fight on the field. Instead of fighting on the battlefield." 　　 At this time, Athena was resurrected, and the cracks on the shield recovered one by one. She turned Ares into a mass of mud and melted on the ground of Skull Island. The originally gloomy Skull Island suddenly grew luxuriant flowers and plants, and the Bixi stone sculpture stood peacefully here. 　　 Athena asked them to be wary of Ares's resurrection, and told them that Bixie was not dead. As long as the Olympics continue, he will be resurrected. The sad Pixue decided to stay with the sixth brother until he woke up. 　　 The Fuwas returned to 2008 and worked hard to protect the Olympic Games.(translated from douban)

title: Xinling Zhi Chuang
synopsis: Through the selfless dedication of female teachers in the mountain village; stories such as the snow disaster, the Wenchuan earthquake, and the solidarity and fighting spirit of the Chinese army people to fight against natural disasters, truly reflect people's optimistic spirit of fighting, fighting and never giving up in adversity.(translated from douban)

title: Qise Zhanji
synopsis: In the universe, many, many light-years away from the Milky Way, there is a beautiful galaxy. Each planet in the galaxy has colorful colors. All living organisms on this galaxy are made of metals and machines. Through the vicissitudes of life, each planet has gradually spawned brilliant civilizations. However, one day long, long time later, the catastrophe of this colorful galaxy is about to come. The cosmic predator Black Hole King, who came from afar, intends to annex this galaxy. The Black Hole King’s planet is his huge spacecraft that specializes in consuming other planets to maintain energy. In the end, only the largest and most beautiful rainbow star in the galaxy survived, because the star has seven countries: red, orange, yellow, green, cyan, blue, and purple. The seven colors are mixed into a rainbow light to protect the planet. , So that the black hole king has no way to speak. However, Prince Zebra, the son of the black hole king, learned that because of the different colors, the seven countries have been fighting for a long time, year after year. As long as one of the colors is eliminated, the seven-color holy light shield will disappear, and the rainbow star will eventually become the food for the black hole spacecraft. The Zebra Prince also took the initiative to ask for help, leading his loyal black knights to sneak into the Rainbow Star to carry out an operation of separation, in an attempt to intensify the war between the seven countries, so that a certain country can be eliminated as soon as possible. Looking at the chaotic current situation of Rainbow Star, Rainbow Star Grand Elder Invincible Earl was deeply worried, and he knew that if this continues, Rainbow Star will embark on a path of self-destruction. So he tried to summon the seven kings for peace talks so that the war would end as soon as possible. Who knew that the kings didn't agree with each other, and they fought again. Not only was peace disillusioned, the Invincible Earl was also beaten into a crippled machine and fell into the mountains. However, Earl of Invincibility was fortunate to be rescued by the orphans living in the deep mountains, and was reborn. It was a pity that his body was replaced by a deer body that could only barely move, and he could not continue to complete the mission of saving the planet. But at this time, he accidentally discovered that Dingy, a different color from the Seven Kingdoms, possessed seven screws—this "little monster" was actually the legendary savior. Dingty thus shouldered the important mission of the savior. According to Invincible Earl’s preliminary idea, the first is to train Dingy to become a super soldier, suppress all forces on the planet, and become the supreme commander in order to end the war. At this time, Prince Zebra also came to the Rainbow Planet. His plan coincided with the Invincible Earl and also seized the leadership of this planet, but he was eager to further escalate the war between the Seven Kingdoms. In this way, two warriors with opposite missions launched a hilarious and thrilling duel between good and evil on Rainbow Star.(translated from baidu baike)

title: Xingyuan Zhanji
synopsis: In the distant future, due to rapid climate warming, glaciers will melt faster, sea levels will rise, and the earth’s ecology 　　The environment is getting worse. In order to protect the earth’s environment, humans have begun to implement large-scale 　　 Searching for the unknown universe, trying to find a new home suitable for human existence, this is the "Star Original Project". 　　During the long journey to open up the universe, the fleet of the immigration regiment encountered a powerful space resource predator: Iraq 　　 Kesi star people. The Excelsiians are ambitious, trying to become the overlord of the galaxy. 　　 launched an attack. In order to maintain the peace of the universe, the fleet of the immigration regiment fought back, consisting of 6 young soldiers Sky Arrows Flying Team, piloting the "Yi-type" high-mobility variable fighter aircraft developed by humans, leading the fleet and Exstar.people launched a vast "Star Wars"...(translated from douban)

title: Leifeng De Gushi
synopsis: Lei Feng was born in a poor family. His parents died at a young age and had to be sent to others. However, Lei Feng is not pessimistic and desperate, but has helped countless people in need with enthusiasm. He is not afraid of hardship or tiredness, and he does his job and loves his job in a variety of different jobs. Finally, Lei Feng grew into an excellent communist fighter. In ordinary work, Lei Feng dedicated all his strength to the cause of socialism and communism. Lei Feng's selfless dedication spirit and touching deeds spread throughout the country, becoming a moral model in people's hearts.(translated from douban)

title: Bushe zhi She
synopsis: Ji Chang is an excellent archer that strives to be the best in the world. He looks for a certain man that is capable of shooting a leaf from a distance. He decides to make this man his master. He visits his master occasionally over the years for training. He eventually masters the techniques of the bow and decides to head out for the mountains in search of an old man with supernatural abilities. (Synopsis found on Anilist.co)

details.Synonyms: Fusha no Sha, Archer without a Bow

title: Sankaku Mado no Sotogawa wa Yoru
synopsis: Shy bookstore clerk Kosuke Mikado has the ability to see ghosts and spirits, an ability he wishes he didn't have, since what he sees usually terrifies him. Rihito Hiyakawa, an exorcist whose supernatural powers are as strong as his social graces are weak, doesn't seem to fear anything, mortal or otherwise. When this odd couple gets together to solve the bizarre cases that come their way, their work methods may not be entirely safe for work!  (Source: Sublime Manga)

title: Shenshou Jingang
synopsis: Years ago, the Dark Emperor, who was ambitious and wanted to rule the universe, harmed the environment and destroyed the peace. In order to stop him, the cosmic leader Big Dipper, after a fierce cosmic war, finally sealed the Dark Emperor under the ice and rocks of the earth's polar regions. To isolate him from the world. In order to prevent the Great Darkness from breaking the seal, after the Great Darkness was frozen, the Big Dipper found the six divine beasts of the earth under the guidance of the earth monks, and used the energy and technology of the Big Dipper to create the six divine beasts King Kong, and brought his son Qilinwang and him The guardian elves stayed behind on the earth. The six divine beasts are Kylin King Kong, Azure Dragon King Kong, White Tiger King Kong, Basalt King Kong, Suzaku King Kong and Eagle Dragon King Kong. Only six children with super powers can control these six divine beasts.(translated from douban)

title: Shenshou Jingang 2: Tianshen De Shou
synopsis: "Mythical Beast King Kong 2" is an original domestic animation with strong Chinese characteristics. It takes Chinese culture as the background, makes extensive use of Chinese traditional mythology and the strange mountains and strange animals in the classic "Shan Hai Jing", fully expresses the characteristics of mythological characters, shows China's long and splendid culture and five thousand years of civilization history, and many new elements The addition of adding a strange and magnificent Chinese color to the whole film. The story tells the story of using love and justice to curb evil and evil is invincible. It tells the children that love and justice are invincible, with the concept of education in fun.(translated from douban)

title: Shenshou Jingang 3 Chao Bianxing Jia
synopsis: The whole story follows King Kong 2, the beast that is trying to occupy the earth, was defeated and fell into a black hole prison-Nether Prison, and found the 36 Heavenly Gangstar mechanical beasts imprisoned by the Big Dipper! Emperor Shu Ming used his only remaining ability to send the mechanical beasts to the earth one by one to seize the Tiangang astrolabe, attempting to use the Tiangang astrolabe to help him escape the black hole. The guardians of the earth, the Supermen of the Mythical Beasts team gained stronger Star Armor power and upgraded to the Mythical Beasts Star Armor Team. They fought one battle after another to protect the earth and the mechanical beasts... (translated from baidu baike)

title: Shenshou Jingang 4 Bang Bao Lixian Ji
synopsis: The balanced nine heavens collapsed into nine great heavenly cones, descending all over the world, and countless humans were inhaled into it. The patron saint of Nineth Heaven is eroded and controlled by evil forces and ravages the earth. In order to rescue the crisis, the sacred beasts struggled with difficulty, received the approval of the hope of the soul, gained strength, bravely entered the nine heavens, experienced fantasy adventures and many trials, with strong will and inner justice, broke the dark legion's conspiracy, and finally repaired the nine heavens. , Saved mankind and the earth.(translated from douban)

title: Shenshou Jingang 5: Chao Neng Jing Jia
synopsis: After the Nine Heavens Crisis, the world has returned to a peaceful scene. In today's society, electronic devices such as mobile phones and computers have become people's daily necessities, and network signals cover the world. Many people are addicted to it and ignore real life, leading to physical and mental illness, and even moral corruption. This has become a stubborn disease of modern society, and it has also made the earth a new target for the dark forces. Virus mechanical beasts hit the earth and spread black crystals. The black crystals float into the screens of people's electronic devices like dandelions. After absorbing energy, they swallow the people in front of the screens, turning ordinary people into black soldiers. Some are addicted to the Internet, or have the Internet. People with bad habits become mechanical beasts.(translated from douban)

title: Shenshou Jingang Zhi Qinglong Zaixian
synopsis: "Shenshou Jingang Zhi Qinglong Zaixian" continues the story background of the "Mythical Beast King Kong" series of animations. It tells the story of a battle between the mythical beast team and the dark power of the alien planet Cursing the Emperor to defend the earth. The Emperor Shu Ming, who has been coveting the earth's water resources, summoned the ancient giant beasts on the earth-Fat Remains, and launched a larger-scale plundering offensive, but the five members of the monster team are the blue dragon superman Ye Hui and the unicorn superman Lin Cong. , Baihu Superman Zhang Li, Zhuque Superman Zhao Yan and Xuanwu Superman Chen Feng each showed their magical powers and started a new round of battle.(translated from douban)

title: Jing Ma Zhanshi
synopsis: During the summer vacation, when Long Yan's interest group was performing the last research mission in the primitive jungle of Acrylic, suddenly countless fireballs in the sky sprinkled on the jungle like a meteor shower. Long Yan and the others had to hide in a cave first, and they were in the cave. They found the four crystal code machines left by the prophet. After understanding some of the functions of the crystal code machines, they summoned their own crystal code beasts and knew each other. At this time, they suddenly encountered the space radiation caused by the evil star legion. Mutated Hualian Batmon, when they were terrified, their four treasure-level crystal code beasts attacked and defeated the Bat beast together. The crystal code machine guided them to the jungle secret room, where they understood their mission ignorantly. Those murals with prophecies tell them that they were selected to find a huge source of energy-four crystals can save the earth, and the evil stars are also looking for these four crystals. The victory or defeat of this war depends on whether they can get it. These four crystals. There is also a road map for finding crystals. The children scan the road map with crystal code machines. Due to the seriousness of the incident, the children were hesitant. At this moment, the Black Spider Beast appeared, and the Azure Dragon Beast attacked bravely, and magically evolved into the primary crystal code beast, the Yanlong Beast, and defeated the Black Spider Beast. The children gradually understood that they must use their own wisdom and strength to help their crystal code beasts, so that they can become stronger step by step-that is, evolve and upgrade, in order to defeat the enemy and complete tasks that seem too important for them. . However, a new crisis came again, and the ambitious Demon King found the evil star who was unwilling to fail. They united and tried to seize the universe, and the Crystal Code Warriors embarked on a journey again, rushing to the asteroid that is being polluted and controlled by the Demon King, to stop their conspiracy... (translated from baidu baike)

title: Dan Zhu Chuanshuo
synopsis: In 1008 of the Eastern Calendar, this was a different world where pinball games were popular. Young Ouyang Xiaofeng sought out the legendary pinball fairy to study his skills in order to find the higher skills of pinball. Later, he met four other good friends who were fighting side by side in Xianzhu Mountain where the pinball fairy was. Perseverance, trust, kindness, and courage have all become the apprentices of Pinball Immortal. The ghost count in the dark has been staring at the five sacred pinball fighters of the pinball immortals, wanting to obtain the five pinball demon gods, gaining its powerful power, and then rule the entire world of marbles. In order to get the five big marble gods and the "marble ring" and "marble scepter" that are out of the people, Earl Ghost is going to eradicate the five warriors such as Ouyang Xiaofeng. Earl Ghost decided to increase the number of marbles through three games. "Scepter" and "Marble Ring", and then rely on their powerful power to seize the five great sacred pinball fighters... (translated from douban)
